findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has been identified as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Function
findings.description: The swap functions do not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform swaps.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: The skim function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected sync Function
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have any access modifiers and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
